name: Tidal Wave (BjornStahl)
description:
This is my submission for Ludum Dare 50.

This game is a new take on the tower defence genre where you have access to zero offensive capabilities. You can not get rid of the attacking waves and will have to use your stout walls to survive.

The world has been overrun by rampaging semi sentient boulders. Try to fend them of for as long as possible.

  • You can only build walls to protect yourself.
  • Build structures to gain materials and food.
  • If boulders manages to climb the walls, people die, if you don't have food, people die.
  • Loose when your population reaches 0.

Hotfix

  • Fixed a problem where you could not restart after loosing.
  • Switched camera.
  • Fixed population growth issue.
